titleStmt.title: A proposal to the Parliament, concerning the restraint of the growing mischief of cheating: by a person that is a great sufferer thereby, but yet more desirous of the publick good, than of the reparation of his private losses, or revenge of injuries.

A proposal to the Parliament, concerning the restraint of the growing mischief of cheating: by a person that is a great sufferer thereby, but yet more desirous of the publick good, than of the reparation of his private losses, or revenge of injuries.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
